column1: Kata Robata////One thing about this place: they know customer service. I revisited after having a not so pleasant first round
column2: and my fellow diner and I were treated like queens. Since I'm not a huge sushi fan
column3: I went with the Chilean Sea Bass. Ohmygod. And joined it with a side of lobster mac and cheese. OHMYGOD. I know it's wrong of me to go to a sushi restaurant and get cooked food
column5: it was worth it. Service was beyond fantastic and the 2 managers on duty made sure we were well taken care of. Fantastic dining experience.
